alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sampson County through 930 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Harrells to 15 miles west of Rose Hill to 8 miles southwest of Clinton. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrells, Garland and Ivanhoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
